name: The Ant and the Fiend
text: Can be used if you control "Oracle of the Sun". Choose one of the following effects: ● Send 1 "Fire Ant Ascator" you control to the Graveyard, and play 1 "Supay" from your Deck. ● Send 1 "Supay" you control to the Graveyard, and play 1 "Fire Ant Ascator" from your Deck. This Skill can only be used once per turn and twice per Duel.
